1.content:
What's up, readers? My name is Katie Suwappe. I'm a slightly chubby, glasses-wearing straight-A student who is a mix of Caucasian and African-American. See, my mom's black while my dad's white. I also have an older sister who I love so much. In addition to my lovely family, I am also dating someone: my basketball-playing boyfriend Daryl Reyab.

But enough about me, let me tell you something that has happened to me.

See, one day I was walking home from school, when I spotted a strange shop. I walked in, and a kindly old lady greeted me. "Hello, dear," she said. "How are you?"

"I'm fine," I said. I let out my hands, as I assumed that she was going to read my palms. She put her hands into mine, then she began saying words in some language that even I, who knows 10 different languages, could not understand. All I know that it definitely was not Latin.

After she stopped speaking what I assumed was gibberish, she then told me to place my hands on both my and her heads. I reluctantly did, and all of a sudden a flash blinding me. When it died, I saw exactly what happened. The old lady and I swapped heads! I look down and saw her bony body attached to my head. I then looked back at the lady, and she had my body from the neck down.

"WHAT DID YOU DO?!" I understandably yelled.

The old lady chuckled. "What you did, dear," she said, "was swap our heads. I have given you this power."

"Power?"

"Just place your hands back on our heads again to get your body back."

I did so, and another flash appeared. When that died, I saw that the lady and I had our respective bodies back. I looked at my own hands, amazed at my ability. "Wow," I said. "So I can swap heads with anyone?"

"Not only that, but you can swap two other people's heads without you being involved."

"Thanks, I guess."

"Have fun, dear!"

I left the shop, thinking of the fun that I was going to have with my new power. I headed...

To my surprise, Brianna could now speak English. “It’s a weird sensation, really, walking on two legs.” Then she realized what she had just done. “Did I just talk? Wow, this is definitely weird! How did this happen?”

I knew she wanted to know what was going on, and I decided the best thing to do was be honest. “An old woman told me I had the ability to swap heads, so I decided to test that theory on you. It looks like it worked.”

1142121.content:
“You think you can swap multiple heads at one?” Brianna asked.

“What do you mean?” I asked.

“Could you try switching the heads of all the dog owners in the world with their dogs? If my memory serves me right you once read a story online about such a scenario.”

“You want to see what a world with human-bodied dogs would look like, right?”

“Yes.”

I remembered that the old lady had told me I could swap two heads at the same time without being physically involved. I closed my eyes and concentrated.

That was when the world rumbled around us. Right now, around the world, millions of dogs were having their bodies replaced with human bodies. It would be interesting to see what the world would be like afterwards.

After about two hours, I opened my eyes again. Brianna seemed eager to do something.

“Let’s go for a walk, Katie,” she said. “I want to see how you did.”

“Ok,” I said. Within a few minutes, Brianna had a collar around my neck, and we went to the street. We could see the results of our ‘experiment’ right in front of us.

“It was very comfortable,” Brianna answered. “I think it’s great to experience life as a human. These pajamas too, the ones I’m wearing and which I once ruined, they’re good.”

I could see what she meant. Those were originally my pajamas, ones she had ripped many months ago after I had brought them home from town. Fran had had to sew them back together through our family’s Singer. And now she was wearing them. Oh, the memories that never leave you.

11512.content:
The tiny plastic body I controlled felt incredible, if a little stiff, and it was easy to see why. She was a bombshell. Cute, but curvaceous, her body type was perfect...if you were a girl who wanted nothing more than to be a boys fantasy. It was exciting and terrifying to be controlling the small body that I had once been jealous of not having, because now I had it. Literally.

But as I gazed up at the dolls original head, painted plastic lips sitting atop a body of flesh and blood that used to be mine, I decided that I should probably get my original body back before something bad happened.

Then there was a knock on my door.

Fear took over completely as I imagined a giant entering the room, catching me in my diminutive state. With much difficulty (damn these awkward joints) I scrambled to hide under my own bed as my door opened, the giant entering the room. "Oh shit, my body!" My original body sat on the floor, comatose with a fake head. At this point I didn't know that nobody else was aware of the swaps, so I couldn't help but panic.

"Katie? Are you in here?" the giant called out, and I recognized her as my mom. I felt a wave of relief, but not enough to convince me to come out of hiding. "I hate it when she hides, she knows it's hard enough to see her as is." That confused me. Was my body considered... normal? It made sense, in a way, for the magic to normalize things, but it was still strange.

I didn't have time to dwell on that thought for very long, though, as mom began to move towards my old body. "Does she really need this old thing?" she said, grabbing one of my old bodies limp arms. "She doesn't need a doll like this anymore, she's a big girl now. I should put this in the attic or something." And with that, she hoisted my lifeless body over her shoulder, and walked out of the room. "Wait, Mom!" I yelled, having gained my nerve, but it was too late. She carried my body off and closed my door behind her, leaving it cracked so I'd be able to open it if I needed to.

I stepped out into the open space of my room in disbelief. She treated my old body like it was the doll. The doll that I was now.

This was not supposed to happen.

"So, wait. You're saying I used to be a doll? I shouldn't even be alive yet soon as you swapped our heads, that's how I'm brought to life?"

I switch us back, of course I'll still be alive, but you would've lost your source of life and just go back to being a plain old doll."
"And only you have the power to switch heads?"

She then placed her gigantic (and what used to be mine anyways) hand on my head, and the other hand on her head. Nothing happens.

She then suddenly grabbed me and brought me up to her face, hugging me.

Then a thought suddenly dawned on me. She brought me right up to her face. This was my chance to take my body back! It was a cruel move, I know, but this is all so sudden to me. Even I wasn't sure about this whole head swapping schtick yet. Yet, at the same time, I don't know. 1153112.content:
A few days have passed, just in time for my birthday. It's actually been a fun few days getting here, with me and Naomi switching places. Getting to show her my area, 'introducing' her to my family members (even though they all act like they've known her their whole lives), my social media, favorite movies, etc. It's been really fun hanging with her, that I honestly don't think I wanna switch back, at least for a while. I don't know. But I don't wanna worry about that, today's my birthday! And of course, first thing I wake up to is-

"HAPPY BIRTHDAY!"

First thing I see is Naomi's grinning face, clearly excited for today.

"AGH. Jesus Naomi, I appreciate that, but I'm still getting used to the size difference."
"Sorry! It's just I've really been looking forward to today!"
"Haha, me too!"

She then puts her hand down, indicating for me to climb on.

"Hope we got good breakfast to start today."
"The best." I said.

Several hours later, the party was in full swing, and soon I saw my best friends arrive.

"Alright Naomi, here they are, those are the girls I was telling you about."
"Right. Anna, Bianca, and Carla."
"Yeah, now remember, even though you're meeting them for the first time, you gotta act like you're all old buddies."
"I don't know Katie, keeping up with this act on meeting new people but pretending I know them, I don't think I can keep up."
"And what? You just want me to take over? I mean I'll do that, but I know you'll come to regret it. You're my friend too Naomi. I want you to enjoy today just as much as I am."

Standing there, thinking, I saw Naomi agree to keep up the charade. I knew that girl wouldn't miss this for anything, and I didn't want her to.

Finally, when all the guests left, Naomi took us back to my room, and first thing she did was do a little twirl when she closed the door.

"Whoa! Easy there, don't try to throw me off!"
"Hahaha, sorry! But today was just so awesome. I loved everything about it! The cake, the presents, meeting your friends!"

She then took off her sandals, plopped down on the bed on her stomach, let me go and I just sat down facing her.

"So I just wanted to say.... thank you." She said
"For what?"
"For just... everything. For taking this huge gamble with letting me borrow your body. For allowing me to live a life, even if for just a few days. Like I said... for everything."

I then noticed a little tear come from Naomi's eye.

"Ohh, come here you silly little goof." I then walked up to her cheek, and we just hugged each other from there. I was really beginning to warm up to this girl.

"Thanks." She then said "But I have to wonder. Today was YOUR birthday, yet I have YOUR body. Don't you think that technically makes it my birthday too?"
"Know something?" I told her, "You make a perfect point. I got just the idea!"

I then put my hand to my head and the other to her cheek, and after a bright flash, Naomi was just a little doll again, and I had my giant, or I guess I should say, NORMAL sized body again. Before leaving the room, I held Naomi in my hands, and just had to smile and appreciate what a kind soul she is.

Then looking down at my own body, "Man. I totally forgot what it felt like being human, heh!"

I ran downstairs, brought something back up, placed me and Naomi in the same position back right before before we switched, then I put my hand to my head, and the other to her head.

After the bright flash, I was back to being doll-sized again, and Naomi woke back up surprised.

"WHOA. What happened? I blacked out for a moment."
"Sorry about that! Had to borrow my body for a bit. But I got you this!

And between me and Naomi was one of the red velvet cupcakes, but with a birthday candle added.

"Yeah I would blow it out quick, don't wanna risk starting a fire!"

She quickly blew out the cupcake, then grabbed me and kissed me on the forehead.

Tears streaming out her eyes, "Thank you Katie. You're the bestest friend I could ever ask for. I love you."
Hugging each other, I told her, "Love you too... sis."

Despite the ironic size differences between us, Naomi was the little sister I never knew I had but always wanted. I'm grateful for her showing up in my life.
